title: Cover an Election Night
description: A political reporter is responsible for covering election results as they come in.

tasks.description: Monitor the official election results feed from the state election board.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a reliable, primary source for results.

tasks.description: As results come in for key races, update a data visualization on the website showing the new totals.
tasks.expected_outcome: The website's graphics are kept up-to-date in real time.

tasks.description: When a major race is called by the decision desk, write a breaking news alert and a short article.
tasks.expected_outcome: News about the race outcome is published immediately.
